mapper.select: /* cetusPosition.getPositionList */ SELECT UID ,NAME FROM CETUS_POSITION WHERE WORKPLACE_UID = #{workplaceUid} AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_ORDER

/* cetusPosition.getPositionListWithUser */ SELECT CP.UID ,CP.NAME ,CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CETUS_POSITION_USER CPU WHERE CPU.POSITION_UID = CP.UID ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS HAS_USER FROM CETUS_POSITION CP WHERE CP.WORKPLACE_UID = #{workplaceUid} AND CP.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY CP.SORT_ORDER
